title: Riverside Geyser, before it erupts, on a sunny day in Yellowstone National Park
description: Riverside Geyser, before it erupts, on a sunny day in Yellowstone National Park
author: m01229
generated_description: A dormant geyser vent sits quietly among colorful mineral deposits and rocky thermal features. Steam wisps gently rise from the geothermal area under bright blue skies. The landscape shows typical thermal basin characteristics with mineral-stained rocks and sparse vegetation adapted to the harsh conditions.
